root.name: Diamond Dan
root.description: OverviewHelp Dan navigate traps, collect treasure and get to the bottom of the caves where the huge reward is waiting in this platform game from Grendel Games.The game contains 4 unique environments and randomly generated levels, so every game is different.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP, Vista, 7Processor: 1.6Ghz minimum, 2Ghz recommendedMemory: 1GB RAMGraphics: 128 MB video RAMDirectXÂ®: 9Hard Drive: 200 MBSound: Windows compatible sound cardMac System RequirementsOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: 1.6Ghz minimum, 2Ghz recommendedMemory: 1GB RAMGraphics: 128 MB video RAM and 800x600 minimum screen resolutionHard Drive: 200 MBSound: Standard audio
